name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Christmas Tree in City Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Light up your browser with the festive charm of Christmas Tree in City Live Wallpaper! 🎄✨

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate the holiday spirit with the Christmas Tree in City Live Wallpaper Chrome extension. Each new tab captures the magic of a beautifully lit Christmas tree amidst a bustling cityscape, spreading warmth and joy. Experience a secure, fast, and smooth browsing experience wrapped in holiday cheer.

Features:
🎅 Festive live wallpapers with enchanting Christmas scenes
🌐 Instant access to your favorite website shortcuts
🔍 Customizable search bar for your chosen search engine
📂 Developer info and simple removal options
Bring the holiday sparkle to your browser and celebrate the season with every click. Download now and let the festivities begin! 🎁❄️
